products.name: Hydrating Face Cream
products.description: A rich, nourishing face cream that deeply hydrates dry skin.
products.ingredients: Water, Glycerin, Cetearyl Alcohol, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Hyaluronic Acid, Aloe Vera Extract
products.usage: Apply a small amount to clean face and neck, morning and night.

products.name: Oil-Free Moisturizer
products.description: A lightweight, oil-free moisturizer that hydrates without clogging pores.
products.ingredients: Water, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Niacinamide, Salicylic Acid, Tea Tree Oil
products.usage: Apply to clean face twice daily, avoiding the eye area.

products.name: Gentle Cleansing Gel
products.description: A mild, soap-free cleansing gel suitable for all skin types.
products.ingredients: Water, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Glycerin, Panthenol, Chamomile Extract, Aloe Vera Juice
products.usage: Massage onto damp face and neck, rinse thoroughly with lukewarm water.

reviews.comment: This face cream is amazing! My dry skin feels so much better.
Great moisturizer for my oily skin. Doesn't leave a greasy feeling.
